argument.name: buttons
argument.description: An array of JSON objects that define the buttons to add. The object defining the button has the following properties:

property.name: hide
property.description: If true then the button will not appear in the list. The default is false.

property.name: disabled
property.description: If true then the button will not appear in the list. The default is false.

property.name: html
property.description: The HTML to put in the button.

property.name: icon
property.description: The icon to put in the button. See [A5.u.icon].

property.name: hoverIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when the user hovers over it. See [A5.u.icon].

property.name: pressedIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when it is pressed. See [A5.u.icon].

property.name: disabledIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when it is disabled. See [A5.u.icon].

property.name: disabledSelectedIcon
property.description: The icon to put in the button when it is disabled and selected. See [A5.u.icon].

property.name: tip
property.description: The TITLE attribute to put in the button that will appear as a tool tip when the user hovers over the button.

link.link: api client api a5 u icon namespace
